mapper.select:
select d.id, name, is_main isMain, hk_phone hkPhone, phone, vehicle_id vehicleId, id_no idNo, driving_no drivingNo, d.supplier_id supplierId, d.supplier_name supplierName, d.status, d.create_user createUser, d.create_time createTime, d.update_time updateTime, d.update_user updateUser, v.plate_number plateNumber, v.hk_number hkNumber from driver_info d left join vehicle_info v on d.vehicle_id=v.id
and d.status= #{form.status}
and d.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and (d.phone like concat('%',#{form.phone},'%') or d.hk_phone like concat('%',#{form.phone},'%'))
and (v.plate_number like concat('%',#{form.carNumber},'%') or v.hk_number like concat('%',#{form.carNumber},'%'))

SELECT v.supplier_id supplierInfoId, s.supplier_ch_name supplierName, v.plate_number licensePlate, v.hk_number hkLicensePlate, d.phone driverPhone, s.supplier_code supplierCode, d.name driverName FROM driver_info d LEFT JOIN vehicle_info v ON d.vehicle_id = v.id LEFT JOIN supplier_info s ON s.id = v.supplier_id where d.id = #{driverId}
